description: cast iron standing figure of George Washington, with black, gold, white and red pigments; figure attached to wood pedestal with plate attached to front
dimension: 7 3/4 x 2 3/4 x 2 1/4 in. (19.69 x 6.99 x 5.72 cm) (including base)
inscription:
Inscriptions

on plate on pedestal, engraved: [5TH CONVENTION / Mechanical / Bank Collectors / SEPTEMBER 15, 1962 / VALLEY FORGE, PA]; on back, below feet, incised: [S.E. Bushong Kennett (illegible)]
object_name: "George Washington, Mechanical Bank Collectors of America" still bank
title: "George Washington, Mechanical Bank Collectors of America" still bank
